title: A Glass House for Elon Musk? Details Emerge About Tesla’s Secretive ‘Project 42’
description: Tesla’s covert project, internally known as “Project 42,” involved the construction of an extraordinary glass-walled structure near the company’s headquarters in Austin, Texas. Initially described as a house for CEO Elon Musk, the project underwent several iterations, drawing attention from Tesla’s lawyers and board members. An order for specialized glass raised concerns among employees regarding ... Read more
